item.title: MATH 116 – Test 3 Practice (Fall 2024)
item.description:
How to use this page
Try each problem on your own first. Then expand Hint or Solution as needed.
Problems 1–11 are multiple choice; 12–15 are free-response.

Formula Sheet

Interest & Exponential Models

  • Compound interest (m times/year)

    \[ A = P\left(1 + \frac{r}{m}\right)^{mt} \]

  • Continuous compounding

    \[ A = Pe^{rt} \]

  • Effective annual rate (from nominal \(r\), \(m\) times/year)

    \[ r_{\text{eff}} = \left(1 + \frac{r}{m}\right)^m - 1 \]

  • Nominal rate from effective rate
